welcome.title: Transform your culinary experience
welcome.feature1: Create unique recipes perfectly tailored to your tastes and needs. Unleash your imagination and make dishes that reflect who you are.
welcome.feature2: Easily share your culinary creations. Download your recipes as PDFs or export them with a single click. Your loved ones can easily import exported files into the app to add them to their account.
welcome.feature3: Automatically generate your shopping list from your recipes. It helps you stay organized and saves you valuable time, while simplifying your shopping management.
welcome.feature4: Enjoy a shared shopping list synchronized in real time. Perfect for families or groups of friends, it ensures seamless coordination between members connected to the same account. One subscription is enough for multiple users!
welcome.feature5: An innovative artificial intelligence that automatically creates recipes based on your criteria. Let yourself be surprised by unique suggestions tailored to your ingredients.
